QuestData.Title: Surviving in a Savage Land
QuestData.Description: Dey may be Alliance, but Admiral Taylor and his men fought with honor on da battlefield.$B$BDey deserve our respect, warchief be praised.$B$BIf an entire garrison be fallin' to dark magic, our work be cut out for us, eh commander?$B$BWe should be goin' back to base. It safe there.$B$BSafer, anyway.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Taskmaster Gornek at Axefall.
QuestData.RewardText: Ukambe gave me the report, commander. You truly are the champion of the Horde.
